name: 15 Questions: TV Shows In Other Words Multiple Choice Quiz | Television

questions.explanation:
One On One.

	This UPN show is about how a father has to raise his teenage daughter alone. With Flex Alexander (Mark "Flex" Washington), Kyla Pratt (Breanna Barns), Robert Ri'chard (Arnaz Ballard), Sicily (Spirit Jones), and Kelly Perine (Duane Odell Knox).

Girlfriends.

	This UPN show is about 4 girlfriends that deal mainly with the troubles of finding a man. With Tracee Ellis Ross (Joan Carol Clayton), Jill Marie Jones (Toni Childs-Garrett), Golden Brooks (Maya Wilkes), Persia White (Lynn Searcy), and Reggie Hayes (William Jerome Dent).

Room Raiders.

	The MTV show where 3 contestants of either all guys or all girls, have their room searched by a member of the opposite sex, to win a date. This show shows how clean people can actually be and the things that they thought they could keep secret.

All That.

	"All That" is a sketch comedy show. It began in 1995 on the kids network Nickelodeon. With a hilarious all-kids cast, crazy characters, loads of laughs, and new celebrity guest host throughout the seasons.

Real TV.

	One of television's all-video, caught-on-camera series featuring remarkable moments from all corners of the globe. "Real TV" brings viewers stories of sports figures, celebrities, incredible stunts and inspiring, high drama rescues. Hosted by Ahmad Rashad.

Rock Me Baby.

	This UPN show is about a young man and woman who become pregnant and have to put there partying and dreams on hold. With Dan Cortese (Jimmy Cox), Bianca Kajlich (Beth Cox), Carl Anthony Payne II (Carl), and Tammy Townsend (Pam Gibson).

Family Matters.

	This show is about a family who is constantly annoyed by their neighbor Steve Urkel. With Jaleel White (Steve Urkel), Kellie Shanygne Williams (Laura Winslow), Darius McCrary (Eddie Winslow), Reginald VelJohnson (Carl Winslow), and Jo Marie Payton (Harriette Winslow).

Real World.

	"The Real World" was one of the first reality shows on tv, premiering in 1992. When "The Real World" was created, it created a new genre of television that years later would be copied by other networks and become almost an obsession around the world. "The Real World" captures the house guest darkest secrets with cameras filming them non-stop for four entire months.

Home Improvement.

	This show is about a carpenter who is married and has 3 sons. With Tim Allen (Tim Taylor), Patricia Richardson (Jill Taylor), Jonathan Taylor Thomas (Randy Taylor), Taran Noah Smith (Mark Taylor), and Zachery Ty Bryan (Brad Taylor).

My Wife And Kids.

	This ABC show is about the regular American family and the situations they encounter. With Damon Wayans (Michael Kyle), Tisha Campbell (Janet Marie "Jay" Kyle), George O. Gore II (Michael Kyle Jr.), Jennifer Freeman (Claire Kyle), and Parker McKenna Posey (Kady Kyle).

Road Rules.

	"Road Rules" is a show where 3 guys and 3 girls team up and do missions to compete for money and prizes while travelling without any of their own money or credit cards. The cast travels a certain route in an RV and co-exist in the cramped quarters on their road trip. At the end, if they complete all the missions successfully, they'll be rewarded...handsomely.

Fear Factor.

	In each pulse-racing "Fear Factor" episode, six contestants (three men and three women) recruited across the country battle in three extreme stunts. These stunts are designed to challenge the contestants both physically and mentally. Hosted by Joe Rogan.

Street Smarts.

	The comedy game show where contestants prove how smart they are by predicting how dumb other people can be. Hosted by Frank Nicotero.

Half And Half.

	This UPN show is about how two completely different sisters live in the same apartment building and finally have the relationship together that they never had in their childhood. With Rachel True (Mona Rose Thorne),  Essence Atkins (Dee Dee Thorne), Valarie Pettiford (Big Dee Dee Thorne), Telma Hopkins (Phyllis Thorne), and Theron "Chico" Benymon (Andre Spencer Williams).

Step By Step.

	This show is about how a man and woman marry and there two completely different families have to live together. With Patrick Duffy (Frank Lambert), Suzanne Somers (Carol Foster Lambert), Staci Keanan (Dana Foster), Angela Watson (Karen Foster), Emily Mae Young (Lilly Foster Lambert), Christine Lakin (Alicia "Al" Lambert) and Christopher Castile (Mark Foster).
